co.cask.tigon.sql.flowlet
Interface InputFlowletConfigurer

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultInputFlowletConfigurer
public interface InputFlowletConfigurer

Configures InputFlowlet.

Method Summary

          Adds a GDAT Input to the InputFlowlet.

          Adds a JSON Input to the InputFlowlet.

          Adds a Query query to the InputFlowlet.

          Sets the description of the InputFlowet.

          Sets the InputFlowlet Name.
